accountNotConfError: Account not configured. Edit preferences to set your login and password.
noServerSet: Account not configured, use the Edit link to set the mail server.
tryToConnectMessage: Trying to connect to the mail server...
errorOccurred: An error occurred, cannot connect to the server.
serverUnavailable: The server is unavailable or does not exist.
serverRefuseConnection: The server refused the connection. Try another port.
checkLoginPassword: Check your login or password, they seem to be wrong.
replyTitle: Reply with your default e-mail application.
replyAllTitle: Reply to all with your default e-mail application.
